record.Program: Advanced Methodologies in the Behavioral, Social, and Health Sciences

record.other_notes: The online master’s program is not currently accepting TOEFL Essentials test scores.

record.Sub_Point_1: Exceptional applicants with speaking subscores of 22 may be considered.
record.Sub_Point_2: Applicants with speaking subscores of 21 or lower will not be considered.

record.other_notes: We are not currently accepting TOEFL Essentials test scores.

record.ESS_Sub_Point: For our residential MA/Ph.D. programs (students must have a minimum of 12 on the Speaking section, and 9 or greater on all other sections). For the Online MS program, students must score 8 or greater on all four sections.
record.other_notes: Note: For the Online MS Program, a minimum TOEFL score of 80, IELTS score of 6.5, and Duolingo score of 120 is required. The minimum section requirements above are for the Residential program. The Online program minimum section requirements align with the graduate school minimums.

record.Other: Computer Science prefers a TOEFL score of at least 100 with sub scores no less than 22 and IELTS score of 7; however, as long as applicants meet Purdue University minimum score requirements, they are eligible to apply to Computer Science.

record.other_notes: We are not currently accepting TOEFL Essentials test scores.

record.ESS_Sub_Point: Students who are externally funded may apply with scores below the minimum requirement of 11.

record.other_notes: The online master’s program is not currently accepting TOEFL Essentials test scores.
The above minimum scores apply to the MS, DNP, and certificate programs. For PhD English proficiency requirements, please see below.

record.Program: Organizational Behavior and Human Resource Management

record.other_notes: NOTE: The Department of Speech, Language, and Hearing Sciences does not waive this requirement even if you have earned a degree within the past 24 months from an institution where English is the primary language of instruction. English proficiency test scores are required of all international applicants whose first language is not English.
The online DSiF program also accept Duolingo English test scores.

record.TSE: TSE (Required for Teaching Assistantship Applicants Only)
